name: speech
description: SpeechPundit Test Automation with Playwright and Cucumber

scripts.test:registration: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:headless: set HEADLESS=true && npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:positive: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags @positive --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:student: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags @student --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:validation: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags @validation --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:required-fields: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags "@validation and @required-fields" --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:ui: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags @ui --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:negative: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags @negative --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:boundary: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags @boundary --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
scripts.test:cross-browser: npx cucumber-js tests/features/registration.feature --tags @cross-browser --require tests/steps/registrationSteps.js --require tests/support/world.js --require tests/support/hooks.js
